context_bundle.summary: Backstage is an open platform for building developer portals that centralizes and standardizes tooling, services, and infrastructure

common_patterns: App creation: 'npx @backstage/create-app@latest' to scaffold new Backstage application
Plugin development: 'yarn new plugin frontend my-plugin' to generate plugin scaffolding
Software catalog: 'apiVersion: backstage.io/v1alpha1 kind: Component metadata: name: my-service spec: type: service lifecycle: experimental owner: team-a'
Authentication: 'app.config.oauth2.github' with clientId and clientSecret configuration
Tech docs: 'mkdocs.yml' in repository root and 'backstage.io/techdocs-ref' annotation in catalog entity
known_errors: Plugin not loading: 'yarn build' and restart dev server, check plugin entry in packages/app/src/plugins.ts
404 on catalog entities: 'curl -k https://backstage/api/catalog/entities/by-name/component/default/my-service' to verify entity registration
Auth callback error: Verify GitHub OAuth app settings and ensure callback URL matches 'https://backstage/api/auth/github/handler/frame'
Database connection failed: 'yarn start-backend --config app-config.local.yaml' and check POSTGRES_CONNECTION_STRING
Tech docs build failed: 'yarn backstage-cli repo build' and verify mkdocs.yml syntax and required plugins
